CmdLine: set -ex;     mkdir -p /usr/src/jsbeautifier;     wget -O jsbeautifier.tar.gz "https://pypi.python.org/packages/5b/cb/d4e4ec35f84cfcca9600cc5efa51e3e654828541437109f48ab85e61fbbe/jsbeautifier-1.7.4.tar.gz";     echo "$JSBEAUTIFIER_SHA256  jsbeautifier.tar.gz" | sha256sum -c -;     tar --strip-components=1 -C /usr/src/jsbeautifier -xf jsbeautifier.tar.gz;     rm jsbeautifier.tar.gz;     pip install         --no-cache-dir         --disable-pip-version-check         /usr/src/jsbeautifier;     rm -rf /usr/src/jsbeautifier
Commands.Name: run
